Package net.peak.agent.energyTradingAgent

Class EnergyTradingAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.core.Agent
      • net.peak.agent.energyTradingAgent.EnergyTradingAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.core.TimerListener, jade.util.leap.Serializable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable
    public class EnergyTradingAgent
extends jade.core.Agent
    The EnergyTradingAgent class is responsible for managing energy trading operations. It handles interactions with the market, manages the agent's internal data model, and coordinates energy offers and forecasts.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setInitialEnergyRessources()
